Comment: In 1977 Likud, Netanyahu's party, made it a core party plank that all lands and properties between the Jordan River and the Mediterranean Sea are Israel, and nobody else. It explains why Israel has never ceded an inch of any of the land and homes they've seized from Palestinians back to them, and why there will never be a Palestinian state. The goal is the complete eradication of even the idea of a Palestinian homeland, and after they succeed the word "Palestine" will only exist in history books and no Palestinian will ever have a homeland to return to.
